scripts.dev:all: env FORCE_COLOR=1 concurrently -k --raw -n PHOENIX,AMMS,ARB -c "green,yellow,cyan" "bash -lc 'pnpm -C packages/phoenix dev'" "bash -lc 'pnpm -C packages/amms dev'" "bash -lc 'pnpm -C services/arb-mm dev'"
scripts.live: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env.live -- bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; TS=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H%M%SZ); REPO_ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null || pwd); DATA_ROOT="$REPO_ROOT/services/arb-mm/data"; mkdir -p "$DATA_ROOT"/features "$DATA_ROOT"/live "$DATA_ROOT"/ml "$DATA_ROOT"/params "$DATA_ROOT"/replay "$DATA_ROOT"/reports/live "$DATA_ROOT"/sessions; export ARB_DATA_DIR="$DATA_ROOT" ARB_REPORTS_DIR="$DATA_ROOT/reports" ARB_REPORTS_LIVE_DIR="$DATA_ROOT/reports/live" ARB_LIVE_DIR="$DATA_ROOT/live" ARB_FEATURES_DIR="$DATA_ROOT/features" ARB_PARAMS_DIR="$DATA_ROOT/params" ARB_REPLAY_DIR="$DATA_ROOT/replay" ARB_ML_DIR="$DATA_ROOT/ml"; RUNTIME_LOG="$DATA_ROOT/reports/live/${TS}.runtime.log"; echo "[live] logging to $RUNTIME_LOG"; SHADOW_TRADING=0 LIVE_TRADING=1 stdbuf -oL -eL pnpm dev:all 2>&1 | tee -a "$RUNTIME_LOG"; EXIT=$?; pnpm report:live:live || true; pnpm -C services/arb-mm daily:if-needed || true; exit $EXIT'
scripts.live:jito: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env.live -- bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; TS=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H%M%SZ); DATA_ROOT="$PWD/services/arb-mm/data"; mkdir -p "$DATA_ROOT"/features "$DATA_ROOT"/live "$DATA_ROOT"/ml "$DATA_ROOT"/params "$DATA_ROOT"/replay "$DATA_ROOT"/reports/live "$DATA_ROOT"/sessions; export ARB_DATA_DIR="$DATA_ROOT" ARB_REPORTS_DIR="$DATA_ROOT/reports" ARB_REPORTS_LIVE_DIR="$DATA_ROOT/reports/live" ARB_LIVE_DIR="$DATA_ROOT/live" ARB_FEATURES_DIR="$DATA_ROOT/features" ARB_PARAMS_DIR="$DATA_ROOT/params" ARB_REPLAY_DIR="$DATA_ROOT/replay" ARB_ML_DIR="$DATA_ROOT/ml"; RUNTIME_LOG="$DATA_ROOT/reports/live/${TS}.runtime.log"; echo "[live:jito] logging to $RUNTIME_LOG"; SHADOW_TRADING=${SHADOW_TRADING:-0} LIVE_TRADING=${LIVE_TRADING:-1} SUBMIT_MODE=jito stdbuf -oL -eL pnpm dev:all 2>&1 | tee -a "$RUNTIME_LOG"; EXIT=$?; pnpm report:live:live || true; pnpm -C services/arb-mm daily:if-needed || true; exit $EXIT'
scripts.start:all: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env -- env FORCE_COLOR=1 concurrently -k --raw -n PHOENIX,AMMS,ARB -c auto "bash -lc 'pnpm -C packages/phoenix start || true'" "bash -lc 'pnpm -C packages/amms start || true'" "bash -lc 'pnpm -C services/arb-mm start || true'"
scripts.start:phoenix: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env -- env FORCE_COLOR=1 pnpm -C packages/phoenix start
scripts.start:amms: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env -- env FORCE_COLOR=1 pnpm -C packages/amms start
scripts.start:arb: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env -- env FORCE_COLOR=1 pnpm -C services/arb-mm start
scripts.backtest:yday: node -e "const d=new Date();d.setUTCDate(d.getUTCDate()-1);d.setUTCHours(0,0,0,0);const f=d.toISOString();const t=new Date(d.getTime()+86400000).toISOString();console.log(f,t)" | xargs -n2 sh -c 'pnpm backtest -- --from "$1" --to "$2"' _
scripts.daily: pnpm backtest:yday && pnpm report:yday && pnpm optimize:yday
scripts.bootstrap: bash -lc 'set -e; corepack enable >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; corepack prepare pnpm@10.15.0 --activate'
scripts.rebuild:bigint: bash -lc 'set -e; export npm_config_build_from_source=1; MOD="node_modules/.pnpm/bigint-buffer@1.1.5/node_modules/bigint-buffer"; if ( [ -d "$MOD" ] ); then echo "[rebuild:bigint] Rebuilding bigint-buffer native addon"; cd "$MOD" && pnpm dlx node-gyp configure build; else echo "[rebuild:bigint] bigint-buffer not found; skipping"; fi'
scripts.postinstall: bash -lc 'set -e; export npm_config_build_from_source=1; MOD="node_modules/.pnpm/bigint-buffer@1.1.5/node_modules/bigint-buffer"; if ( [ -d "$MOD" ] ); then echo "[postinstall] Rebuilding bigint-buffer native addon"; cd "$MOD" && pnpm dlx node-gyp configure build; else echo "[postinstall] bigint-buffer not found; skipping"; fi'
